amendment.description: To adjust the urban health provider payment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1044 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1044 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S8681, S8683; text: CR S8683) To adjust the urban health provider payment.
